com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.documentstore

Interface IExternalDataDocumentSource


  • public interface IExternalDataDocumentSource
    A method for downloading binary documents from an external data source.
    Since:
    6.0

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      InputStream getDocumentContents(String id)
      Gets an InputStream that contains the binary content of the specified document from an external data source.

    • Method Detail

      • getDocumentContents

        InputStream getDocumentContents(String id)
                                throws DocumentNotFoundException,
                                       AccessPermissionDeniedException
        Gets an InputStream that contains the binary content of the specified document from an external data source.
        Parameters:
        id - A String that contains the identifier of the document to be downloaded.
        Returns:
        See above.
        Throws:
        DocumentNotFoundException - If there is no document with the specified identifier.
        AccessPermissionDeniedException - If the current user is not permitted to read the document.
